DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness worksite diet exercise program weight loss postpartum woman .
DOC.brief_title: Get Active Eat Right : Moms Work
DOC.detailed_description: This project research study investigate effect worksite diet exercise intervention weight loss overweight postpartum woman . Weight loss program show effective reduce postpartum weight retention . However , high attrition rate study suggest add responsibility new infant home return work may limit woman 's ability follow diet plan exercise regularly . We hope offer weight loss program workplace , increase participant retention maximize weight loss population . Our primary aim promote weight loss preserve lean body mass 12 week intervention . Secondary aim include increase cardiovascular fitness baseline improve cardiovascular biomarkers , include total , LDL , HDL cholesterol , triglyceride , glucose , insulin , marker inflammation metabolism .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old , 10 14 week postpartum , University faculty , staff , student , BMI 2535 least 4.5 kilogram heavy prepregnancy weight , English speaking Smoking , chronic disease , BMI > 35
